page.title: 10LAW
page.content: Hythe Court meets twice every Wednesday and once every Tuesday. On Tuesday it deals with domestic and traffic offences. Hythe Court has three Magistrates one of which is an English teacher at Noadswood School. The shortest sentence is one day and the longest is 6 months imprisonment, or you can go up to three lots of 6 months imprisonment. The highest fine is Â£50,000 and that is when Esso spill oil into the sea, for example. The fine for speeding in Hythe is Â£1.50 per mile over the speed limit, and if they go 20 mph over the limit it is doubled. You have three penalty points on your licence every time you are fined for speeding. The most common crime is petty motoring offences. All crimes committed in Hythe are first dealt with in Hythe, but more serious crimes then go to the Crown Court.
